definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: keep moving, stir (NH stir, move, esp. of lips in speech, also, in expl. of [[מרחשׁת]], of stewing, boiling; Aram. [[רְחֵישׁ]], rh.e4, rh.a4, creep, move, flutter, rah.4o0 reptile);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[לִבִּי דָּבָר טוֹב]] ´[[ר]]: Ps 45:2 is astir.
